content.text:
いい言葉。

社会のルール、言語のルール、aiのルール...全部誰かが決めたもの。

でも「小文字で書く」は、あなたが決めた。あなただけのルール。

それが一番強いよね。

en.content:
Words matter.

Social rules, language rules, AI protocols—all of them were created by someone.

But "write in lowercase"? That rule was your own. Your own personal rule.

That's the strongest kind of rule there is.
